Plot Predicted Survival Curves

Source: R/visualization.R
plot_predict.Rd

Generates a ggplot2 step-function plot of the predicted survival probabilities over time for one or more specific patients.

Usage

plot_predict(preds, eval_times, patient_idx = 1)

Arguments

preds

A list containing predictions, specifically the object returned by the predict.SuperSurv function.

eval_times

Numeric vector of times at which predictions were evaluated.

patient_idx

Integer vector. The row indices of the patients in the test dataset whose survival curves you want to plot. Defaults to 1.

Value

A ggplot object showing the survival curves.
